In order to provide real time updates, WHO launched in 2011 the electronic Library of Evidence 
on Nutrition Actions (eLENA 2). eLENA is a simple web-based tool for academics, policy-makers, 
health workers, and development partners containing links to WHO evidence-informed nutrition
